creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Takako and Victor Hauge
description: orange and gold brocade monk's stole with purple lining; black lacquered ring holding straps together on PL side; subtle appliqued motif on front; embroidered star on back of strap
medium: Silk, old vermillion and gold brocade
title: Noh Costume of a Buddhist Priest's Robe
